entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 40%
